Community Meetings and Events

This page lists past and future meetings of the Probabilistic Numerics community.

2014

  • 21/22 August – Roundtable on Probabilistic Numerics
    hosted by the Max Planck Institute for Intelligent Systems in Tübingen, Germany
    organized by Philipp Hennig and Michael Osborne

2012

  • 8 December – Inaugural NIPS Workshop on Probabilistic Numerics
    hosted by Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems 2012, Lake Tahoe, Nevada, USA
    organized by Philipp Hennig, Michael A Osborne and John P. Cunningham
